description: A React component defining a modal dialog that renders conditionally based on the 'isOpen' prop. The component includes a header with a title and a close button, and displays its children inside the modal content area. It uses a portal-less technique to display the modal overlay.

methods.name: Modal({ isOpen, title, children, onClose })
methods.description: Functional React component for rendering a modal dialog.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ isOpen, title, children, onClose }) {$/
